channel.title: Server is already in use?
channel.description:
Ok guys, so instead of portforwarding, Im using uTorrent, but when I run server I get "Sever is already in use". Does anyone know how to solve this? Any and all help is appreciated
-Thanks
Zukyak

item.title: Server is already in use?
item.dc:creator: @vamp256 vamp256
item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

that’s an error within your client class.

Read full topic

item.title: Server is already in use?
item.dc:creator: @Zukyak Zukyak
item.description:
@Zukyak wrote:

0wn3r k4t3:

Shut off utorrent. turn on server. run utorrent

Well I got passed that but now i get this error when I’m trying to connect to my server:

Connection from roger.gateway.2wire.net:4398 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8679) at client.run(client.java:18483) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (roger.gateway.2wire.net) Connection from roger.gateway.2wire.net:4398 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8679) at client.run(client.java:18483) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (roger.gateway.2wire.net) Connection from roger.gateway.2wire.net:4398 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8679) at client.run(client.java:18483) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (roger.gateway.2wire.net)

Read full topic

item.title: Server is already in use?
item.dc:creator: @Zukyak Zukyak
item.description:
@Zukyak wrote:

[quote=“Hotmailer, post:2, topic:325076”]Hmm, try running your server first, then try opening up uTorrent.

BTW, i can help you portforward with your router if you need it.[/quote]

I’m Horribale at port forwarding…
I have a 2WIRE 2701 HG-B router
if thats any help.

And I’ve tried restarting like 5 times

EDIT:
Ok so I portforwarded and I checked with the tool from portforward.com Its says my port is OPEN
But… I still get this EXACT same message “Server is already in use”

Read full topic

item.title: Server is already in use?
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

it means ur server is already running on that port
try a different port, or something (somethings up with ur comp maybe? try restarting)

Read full topic
